briefdescription.para: Acts as the player score. Increases/decreases when mouse eats good/bad food.
Acts as mana for player abilities. Increased by player stroking.
Mouse level increases at certain weight thresholds. Affects game difficulty and player abilities.
Immunity to bad foods. Can be set by player ability. (cover all bad foods or only some?)
Ability to gain weight; acts as score multiplier to food points. Can be set by player ability.
immunity to being scared by cats, ants etc. Can be set by player ability.
Whether the mouse should be scared off-screen.
For detecting if a stroke has started.
Happiness levels at which to change happiness indicator.
Gets the maximum mouse weight
Property to get mouse weight. Read only.
Property to get mouse level. Read only.
Property to get and set mouse immunity Can be called by Player Ability code
Property to get and set mouse growth ability (leptin deficiency) Can be called by Player Ability code
Property to get and set mouse fearless(ness) Can be called by Player Ability code
Property to get and set whether the mouse is off-screen Can be called by Player Ability code
Checks and updates mouse level and changes sprite accordingly
Updates mouse happiness when stroked Works for both touch and mouse input
Detects whether mouse has been touched If yes sets stroked to true to begin stroke detection

coroutine that rotates specified transform starting counterclockwise from its origin between two specified angles with linear easing angle1 must be negative and angle2 positive To track the state of easeK it cannot be passed as a parameter or its value will reset each time
To be called by level controller to see whether mouse has been tapped Fires food at mouse if mouse is tapped
Stop mouse rotation
Start mouse rotation

Script class that controls behaviour of the mouse. Keeps track of mouses status such as weight, happiness, level, and attributes that can be set by player abilities: (immunity, leptinDeficiency, fearless)
